column1: French Teacher @ Kunskapsskolan School DLF Phase 1 Gurgaon
column2: Looking for full time French teacher Certificate / Diploma in teaching French Language Minimum 2 years of experience in teaching French

French Language Teacher - DELF B2/C1 Experience:   1+ Years Location: 100% Remote (India) Job Type: Part-time/Full time/ Freelancing  Responsibility: Create the study material for students as DELF exercise. Deliver engaging and effective lessons in the French language, covering vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation, speaking, listening, reading, and writing skills. Plan, prepare, and deliver lessons tailored to students preparing for the DELF A1, A2, B1 & B2 examination. Develop curriculum and educational resources specifically designed for DELF A1, A2, B1 & B2 learners, including practice exercises, and mock exams. Assess students' progress through regular tests, assignments, and mock exams, providing constructive feedback to enhance their learning. Adapt teaching strategies to cater to various age groups, proficiency levels, and learning styles. Stay updated with the latest DELF examination formats and requirements to ensure all teaching materials are relevant and effective. Offer personalized guidance and support to students, addressing their individual needs and challenges. Required: Must Qualified DELF B2 + Graduate. Good content knowledge. Proven experience-teaching French at the DELF B1 level or higher, with specific experience preparing students for the DELF exams. Fluent in English (Both written and oral). Be passionate about the teaching and learning. Send your detailed resume at: recruiter1@lightuptechnologies.com
column11: DELF B2/C1, French Teaching, French, DELF, French Language

column2: The role of the Success Guide will be responsible for helping to grow customers value and improve adoption at scale     The Success Guide will engage with customers across all account segments, delivering 1:Many programs and 1:1 Success Guidance to Salesforce customers     They will partner with Success Managers and the Sales teams     Success Guides play a crucial role in providing the right recommendation at the right time, enabling customer value realization at scale       The ideal candidate is organized, agile, and passionate about Customer Success     They have excellent presentation and communication skills in both a 1:1 and group setting     Using their product knowledge they deliver value to both customers and internal teams          Responsibilities:             Deliver 1:1 1:Many customer engagements         Action Best Practice Insight         Product Education         Technical Advice         Adoption Guidance             Accelerate Feature / Cloud Adoption         Manage Consultative Engagements with Customers         Drive Guided Success Engagements         Support Success Teams             Required Compulsory Qualifications Skills:             Engineering degree preferred         Overall 5+ years of experience with a minimum of 3 years of relevant work experience in one or more Salesforce products including Service, Platform, Commerce Cloud, etc.         Experience of 1 year working on Sales Cloud       Proficiency in both French and English, including the ability to read and write, is necessary to effectively engage with customers.       Preferred Sales Cloud Consultant certified             Preferred Qualifications Skills:             Working knowledge of the overall Salesforce platform suite and applications         Proven success leading customer-facing presentations and engagements         Able to handle objections, prioritize customer issues, and collaborate with manager and colleagues to effectively drive resolution         Proven ability to manage time and prioritize activities while performing effectively under pressure         Support Success and Sales Teams to ensure that customer gets maximum value out of the platform          Understanding of business analysis, change management, user adoption, release management, and governance             Soft Skills:               COMPOSURE       : Strong customer-facing communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to support complex engagements           EXPERTISE       : Working knowledge of industry best practices and implementation experience of the salesforce product suite           LEARNER       : Has a passion for continued education in new technologies and complex business and technical concepts           PASSION       : Passionate about Customer Success and a great listener           CULTURE       : Embodies inclusive culture and a team player that everyone enjoys working with           TRUST       : Ability to earn the trust of the customer and live the company s core values
